DOC.brief_summary: Despite emerge interest tocotrienols , absorption tocotrienols human remain unclear especially different fat diets.This study aim evaluate absorption distribution tocotrienols plasma lipoprotein association high low fat diet . Different fat level affect absorption distribution tocotrienols
DOC.brief_title: Study Tocotrienol Absorption Distribution Under Different Fat Status
DOC.detailed_description: There possibility absorption distribution tocotrienols may occur differently compare tocopherol , especially different fat status
DOC.criteria: male age 2225 body mass index 18.5 < X < 30 kg/m2 plasma cholesterol < 5.2 mmol/L , TAG < 1.7 mmol/L history cardiovascular disease diabetic body mass index < 18.5 > 30 kg/m2 plasma cholesterol > 5.2 mmol/L , TAG > 1.7 mmol/L hypertension currently take Vitamin E supplement current use medication smoking .
